greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First differences of k^n.
comment: Rows include A011782, A025192, A002001, A005054, A052934, A055272, A055274, A055275, A052268, A055276. Diagonals include A053506, A085389, A085390. Row-wise binomial transform is A083064.
formula: Square array defined by T(n,k) = k*(k+1)^n/(k+1) + 0^n/(k+1).
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jun 30 2003
